articles.description: Reaction as Bournemouth come from three goals down to beat Luton 4-3, Atletico Madrid and Borussia Dortmund reach Champions League quarter-finals, plus build-up to tonight's European action.
articles.title: Football latest: Bournemouth pull off remarkable comeback win

articles.description: At his lowest moment, Felipe Nystrom awoke from an overdose, sad to have survived. His story of recovery and resilience since has captivated one corner of the cycling world.
articles.title: Felipe Nystrom: From drug addiction and despair to the world championship

articles.description: On a night when all eyes were on the Champions League, the Premier League witnessed its biggest comeback win in more than 20 years as Bournemouth beat Luton
articles.title: 'Unreal' - The best Premier League comeback win in 20 years

articles.description: Teenager Oliver Bearman says it was "really fulfilling" to have Lewis Hamilton and Fernando Alonso praise him after his F1 debut.
articles.title: Oliver Bearman 'proud' of Lewis Hamilton & Fernando Alonso praise

articles.description: From a surprise debut to disappointment even in victory, World Cup-winning captain Martin Johnson reflects on the England v France rivalry from matches gone by.
articles.title: 'We walked off like we had lost' - memories of England v France

articles.description: Arsenal defender Ben White signs a new long-term contract with the club.
articles.title: White signs new four-year contract with Arsenal

articles.description: Borussia Dortmund reach the Champions League quarter-finals for the first time in three years thanks to goals from Jadon Sancho and Marco Reus against PSV Eindhoven.
articles.title: Sancho sends Dortmund into quarter-finals

articles.description: Friday's match between Chelsea and Arsenal at Stamford Bridge "could really flip" the Women's Super League title race, says Ellen White.
articles.title: Arsenal win 'could flip things' in WSL title race

articles.description: Atletico Madrid dramatically beat Inter Milan on penalties to reach the Champions League quarter-finals and eliminate last season's runners-up.
articles.title: Atletico beat Inter on penalties to reach last eight

articles.description: The Sacramento Kings defeat the Los Angeles Lakers in the Western Conference, while the Denver Nuggets continue their winning streak.
articles.title: NBA: Sacramento Kings survive late LeBron James surge to beat Los Angeles Lakers
